page.title: 05GALA WEEK,FORT AUGUSTUS.(1).
page.content: The highlight for many people in the summer in {Fort-Augustus }is the { {Great Glen Gala }week, which means a week of fun and entertainment for all. During the week there are various sports competitions for all ages. These include "fancy dress" football,children's shinty,canoe racing on the {Caledonian Canal}, tennis and a treasure hunt.For many the best event is the wheelbarrow race.In this competition teams of 2 have a "fancy dress" wheelbarrow race round the local hotels and pubs.They have to drink a whisky and a beer in each hostelry.As they visit 5 establishments there is much hilarity by the finish.There is to be a children's race this year,but with lemonade instead of alcohol.
